creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: the busts of two kabuki actors, each in separate vignette overlapping tree in background with pink leaves and blossoms; actor at top tilts head down towards L; white paint on face with fierce red paint arcing around eyes, frowning mouth; figure in lower vignette holds portion of green sword handle in hands; pink upturning makeup under eyes
medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
title: Four Kabuki Actors
